script:
1). Where do we keep the expense vouchers?
They're in Mr. Doran's office. 
Yes, they're very expensive.
I don't have any pouches.
2). This CD-ROM isn't working right.
I hate DVDs.
What's wrong with it? 
Yes, I'm working tonight.
3). When will you go on vacation?
To Disneyland.
The week of the 12th. 
I was going on the 24th.
